title: Design and Optimization of Metamaterial-Based IoT Sensor Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of mathematics (calculus, linear algebra) and programming fundamentals
context.additional_context: Project-centered education to enhance practitioners' capabilities in designing low-cost IoT sensor systems

learning_goals: One can mathematically model the physical properties of metamaterial sensors and the principles of signal reflection
A system can be designed to achieve over 90% accuracy in reconstructing environmental distributions using deep learning-based optimization algorithms
A mathematical approach can be applied for optimizing the placement of distributed sensor networks
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
